Title: Mission: Impossible III
Overview: Retired from active duty, and training recruits for the Impossible Mission Force, agent Ethan Hunt faces the toughest foe of his career: Owen Davian, an international broker of arms and information, who is as cunning as he is ruthless. Davian emerges to threaten Hunt and all that he holds dear -- including the woman Hunt loves.
Keywords: berlin, cia, vatican, white house, secret identity, secret, explosive, mobile phone, map, traitor, mask, honeymoon, shanghai, pretended murder, secret mission, letter, funeral, covered investigation, to shoot dead, secret agent, video, stamp, hard drive, e-mail, decipherment, suitcase, computer, revenge, murder, mission, hospital, duel, disguise, celebration, good and bad, research laboratory, blast
